trend_summary: Across the series, the village core slowly expanded along the main road, adding scattered houses and a small subdivision while farmland edges re-greened. Forest cover thickened, riverbanks naturalised, and a modest airstrip gained a longer cleared zone. No large industrial or high-rise growth appeared, keeping the landscape predominantly rural and low-density.
notable_changes: Gradual infill of single-family houses along the northâ€“south arterial road.
New cul-de-sac subdivision emerges east of the village centre.
Cleared runway/airstrip area lengthened and its service yard enlarged.
Several pasture fields convert to secondary woodland, boosting overall tree cover.
Riparian corridor widens, with fewer tilled fields adjacent to the river.
